response: Man, I've been all 'round this country. And in my travels I've seen every manner of stuffy law man thinking he's a big shot on account of that badge he wears. But I tell ya, there's a lot more to bein' a man than just followin' the law.
There's a certain code in this world that any righteous man should live by. And the law has nothin' to do with that.
The way these lawyers talk. Well, it makes you crazy. They seemed to have a good case for the guy's guilt. Finger prints on the trigger and all.
But I look at that guy and I just can't see it.
I figure I can size up any man with enough time. And given that I've spend enough time in this goddamn court room to last me a lifetime, I just can't figure that man as a killer.
Evidence bein' what it is, he's probably guilty. But something about him gives me pause.
I'm a womanizer. That's God's honest truth.
A man is defined by his code.

text: Well, I suppose the level-headed thing to do is discuss the shotgun the kid used in the crime.
I suppose we should talk about the shotgun next.
